page.title: 11West Bromwich Hospital
page.content: The Sandwell District General Hospital was opened in 1979 by Princess Alexandra.The hospital receives patients from all over Sandwell, looking after them in 22 wards with 578 beds, in temperature conditions of 22 degrees Celsius. The medical staff comprises 102 junior medical and 70 senior consultants supported by 700 nurses. The hospital has available modern equipment the newest item being the body scanner. A new maternity wing is nearing completion with the hospital having 2,694 births in 1984. The medical staff are supported by a large administrative staff such as medical secretaries,ward clerks, porters,cleaners,receptionists, engineers,security etc. The hospital has a day nursery serving pre-school children belonging to the staff of the hospital.
